textContent:
The life I need to feel most alive and my full self is not the life I have 
- safety and freedom to create 
- generative and active collaboration 
- integration across all parts of my life 
- deep connection with my partner 

There is a lot of fragmentation 
- compartmentalized family, friends, work
- lots of disparate projects w/o synergy like chamber, DJing, radioshow
- 


I think part of my sadness is feeling an unreconcilable paradox over and over. 

I am really excited about the ideas coming through me in my work. 

And I just feel what I care about in my work feels like it puts the people I care about out

And it's a lot to hold and it hurts 

I love to create and invent 

The more I do it the more I want to do it 
The more I do the less I feel connected to you and to my family. 
I want and need partners on my journey. 
The more it feels like two different journeys



I feel like the path to the most sustainable happiness is to get through the short term reconciliation of this reality together 

And until now I haven't been taking ownership of my own life and what I feel called to contribute.



One that I originally blamed you and the kids for getting in the way  That a calling to articulate and share an idea that keeps coming through me from all of my experiences, feels so important to share in the world right now, so important to seed for our kids future. And that this idea that isn't mine but one that I'm using my gifts to articulate and magnifiy is happening. that I need to be doing this work. And yet that feeling is forever a trade off between the work to make this happen and hurt that it brings to you and my family because my attmy work feels consistently at odds with our connection. I feel a pull towards the ideas I have  but it feels like there is no integration with you or the kids and it feels sad. I've had this experience over and over and just consistently unclear on how to resolve it and feel
textContentHtml:
The life I need to feel most alive and my full self is not the life I have 

- safety and freedom to create 

- generative and active collaboration 

- integration across all parts of my life 

- deep connection with my partner 


There is a lot of fragmentation 

- compartmentalized family, friends, work

- lots of disparate projects w/o synergy like chamber, DJing, radioshow

- 



I think part of my sadness is feeling an unreconcilable paradox over and over. 


I am really excited about the ideas coming through me in my work. 


And I just feel what I care about in my work feels like it puts the people I care about out


And it's a lot to hold and it hurts 


I love to create and invent 


The more I do it the more I want to do it 

The more I do the less I feel connected to you and to my family. 

I want and need partners on my journey. 

The more it feels like two different journeys




I feel like the path to the most sustainable happiness is to get through the short term reconciliation of this reality together 


And until now I haven't been taking ownership of my own life and what I feel called to contribute.




One that I originally blamed you and the kids for getting in the way  That a calling to articulate and share an idea that keeps coming through me from all of my experiences, feels so important to share in the world right now, so important to seed for our kids future. And that this idea that isn't mine but one that I'm using my gifts to articulate and magnifiy is happening. that I need to be doing this work. And yet that feeling is forever a trade off between the work to make this happen and hurt that it brings to you and my family because my attmy work feels consistently at odds with our connection. I feel a pull towards the ideas I have  but it feels like there is no integration with you or the kids and it feels sad. I've had this experience over and over and just consistently unclear on how to resolve it and feel
